article.headline: Rider 77, Canisius 65
article.story: BUFFALO N.Y. (AP) -- Jerry Johnson scored 27 points to lead Rider to a 77-65 win over Canisius Thursday night. Rider (10-6, 4-2 MAAC) pulled away from the Golden Griffins with a 14-2 run after Canisius tied the score at 63 on a 3-pointer by Kevin Downey with 4:22 to play. Johnson scored on a fast break with 3:35 to go during the run. Rider was 21-23 from the free throw line for the game, 10-12 in the game's final three minutes. Edwin Muniz had 15 points and 14 rebounds for Rider, and Steve Castleberry added 13 points. Downey led Canisius (7-11, 2-5) with 17 points, while Toby Foster had 15 points and 11 rebounds. Darnell Wilson scored 13 points and Dewitt Doss had 12.
